pkcs11Short.description: Description of the PKCS #11 module short message

pkcs11Text.message: make PKCS #11 modules accessible to the browser as sources of keys and certificates

sessionsText.message: Can list and restore, tabs and windows that have been closed while the browser has been running

contextualIdentitiesText.message: Can list, create, remove, and update contextual identities/ containers

dnsText.message: Enables an extension to resolve domain names.

managementText.message: Access info about all installed addons

privacyText.message: Access and modify various privacy-related browser settings.

nmT.message: Native messaging enables an extension to exchange messages with a native application installed on the user's computer

themeText.message: Enables browser extensions to update the browser theme

cprT.message: Can copy the data from web page

idleText.message: Find out when the user's system is idle, locked, or active.

notificationText.message: Display notifications, using the underlying operating system's notification mechanism

bookmarksText.message: Can interact with and manipulate the browser's bookmarking system

findText.message: Can find text in a web page, and highlights matches.

historyText.message: Can interact and manipulate the browser history.

searchText.message: Can list all search engine and search with a specific search engine

atT.message: Can access data from any active tab and can inject code and style to active tab

tabsText.message: Can get a list of opened tab and can open, update, move, reload, and remove tab

browserSettingsText.message: Can change global browser settings, like allowing popups

cookiesText.message: Can get and set cookies, and be notified when they change

downloadsText.message: Can download files, cancel, pause, resume downloads

topSitesText.message: Can get pages that the user has visited often and frequently.

webNavText.message: Can intercept every HTTP request made by browser

webReqText.message: Can intercept every HTTP request made by browser

wrbT.message: Can block and modify the request made by browser.

unlimitedStorageText.message: Can store any amount of data

bdT.message: Can clear all data which is collected while browsing Cookies/passwords/Cache/history/downloads/formData

devtoolsText.message: Can create a developer tool panel

identityText.message: Can generate OAuth2 authorization code or access token and use to access user data
